entry.title: A miscellany of tips and tricks
entry.content:
Numpy

A matrix filled with False values: np.ones((10, 10), dtype=bool).

Linux & Bash

See content of compressed files:

  • unzip -l compressed.zip
  • tar -l compressed.tar.gz
  • unrar -l compressed.rar

To create an editable symlink file use always an absolute path: ln -sf ~/repositories/config-files/.vimrc ~/.vimrc

R

Subsetting a matrix:

x <- matrix(1:6, 2, 3) x[1, 2] # this will return a vector x[1, 2, drop=FALSE] # this line will return a 1x1 matrix

Docker

  • Stop and remove containers: docker stop (dockerps−a−q)dockerrm(docker ps -a -q)
